fullName: Batch GET feature: Get Batch details for a specific BatchID

labels.value: Get Batch details for a specific BatchID

name: Get Batch details for a specific BatchID
description:
Given: User is on GET method with endpoint {{baseurl}}/batches/batchId/{batchId}
  When: User sends the GET request with valid Batchid
  Then: User receives 200 OK status code
  And: User should see the Batch details for the given Batchid
